definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[כ]]: Da 6:26 [[ל]]pers. + orat. rect., Da 7:1 acc. rei; 3 mpl. [[כְּתַ֫בוּ]] Ezr 4:8 acc. [[אִגְּרָה]]; 1 pl. [[נִכְתּוּב]]Ezr 5:10, ac. rei; Pt. act. abs. fs. [[כָּֽתְבָה]] Da 5:5, subj. [[יְדָא]], fpl. [[כָּֽתְבָן]] v:Da 5:5, subj. [[אֶחְבְּעָן]].

definitions.title: Pe‘îl
definitions.body: (W:CG 224) Pf. 3 ms. [[כִּדְנָה]] [[כְּ תִּיב]]Ezr 5:7 thus (it) was written, so ´[[כֵּן כ]]: Ezr 6:2.
